scripts.build: pnpm typecheck && rm -rf dist && pnpm bundle && npm run copy-css
scripts.typecheck: cross-env FORCE_COLOR=1 npm_config_color=always tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit --pretty true && tsc -p ./cli/tsconfig.json --noEmit --pretty true
scripts.typecheck:watch: cross-env FORCE_COLOR=1 npm_config_color=always concurrently --raw -k -n TSC,CLI "tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit -w --pretty true --preserveWatchOutput" "tsc -p ./cli/tsconfig.json --noEmit -w --pretty true --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.dev: cross-env FORCE_COLOR=1 npm_config_color=always concurrently --raw -k -n CSS,TS-COMPILE,TS-CHECK "pnpm dev:css" "pnpm bundle:watch" "pnpm typecheck:watch"
